attributes.action: Replace all Metropolitan Police Sirens with the first 50 seconds of Joe Loss's "March Of The Mods" Instrumental 1964 track.
attributes.additional_details:
Replace all Metropolitan Police Sirens (cars, motor bikes, push bikes, river boats, helicopters) with the first 50 seconds of Joe Loss's marvellous 1964 "March of the Mods". It's more direct and has greater impact than "nee narr, nee narr" one they have at the moment.

I know for a fact I'd I had stolen a car and was chased by  the fuzz that was playing "March of the Mods" I'd have to pull over due to wetting myself laughing.
